net.jmatrix.eproperties.include
Interface PropertiesLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
MethodPropertiesLoader, URLPropertiesLoader
public interface PropertiesLoader

When include syntax is encountered, the URLPropertiesLoaders are consulted to load said properties.

Method Summary
